description: Designed and modernized the look and feel of the client Connection Broker Web Interface; including login page, interactive navigation menus, and complex forms.
Built and delivered completed HTML, CSS, and Javascript files that will be integrated into the client code base.
Completed 10-week immersive bootcamp to develop critical, applicable programming skills and become an active contributor of a software engineering team.
Applied fundamental learnings in Agile methodologies, pair programming and collaborative development, TDD, OOP, continuous integration and Git workflow.
A focus on front-end and UX/UI design, applying Javascript, React.js, HTML, CSS and Sass, wire-framing, and Ruby on Rails.
Entered all job orders and project schedules, and delegated resources for each project.
Worked with senior management to develop new processes within the production department.

Acted as project liaison between departments. Ensured all necessary assets, resources, and deadlines were identified and properly managed day-to-day to meet organizational expectations and project goals.
Executed warm and cold calls to maintain and develop new business.
Met with hiring managers to understand staffing needs, and made recommendations regarding best available candidates.
Oversaw life-cycle of all orders, including quoting, order entry and data management utilizing Visual CRM.

Led development of and maintained new order management system, designed to process all incoming orders and artwork of a multimillion dollar commercial and secure card company producing 1.4 billion cards per year.
Managed the art department and worked closely with pre-press to optimize workflow and resolve quality control issues.

Primary designer of creative material including posters, fliers, postcards and other print media utilizing Adobe Creative Suite. Conceived and executed annual fund and direct mail packages for national colleges and universities.
Created the position of graphic designer for a print distribution company.

Designed creative material including multi-page documents complete with index, brochures, fliers, postcards and other print media utilizing the Adobe Creative Suite and performed all on-site photography as necessary saving the customer from additional costs.
Digitally created and set type for a variety of print materials including postcards, multi-page catalogs and fliers utilizing Quark Xpress and the Adobe Creative Suite.
